test_cases.Title: Number Selection_001_VinciCasa_APP_TEST_Mobile_selecting the first number

Steps.Expected Result: The home screen of the VinciCasa app is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Tap on the number 1 on the combination selection screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The number 1 is highlighted and added to the selection.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has the VinciCasa app installed and is on the combination selection screen.
test_cases.Expected Result: The total combinations selected is updated to 1.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only selection of the first number; does not verify combination limits.

test_cases.Title: Multiple Number Selection_002_VinciCasa_APP_TEST_Mobile_selecting multiple numbers

Steps.Expected Result: The home screen of the VinciCasa app is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select numbers 1, 2, and 3 on the combination selection screen.
Steps.Expected Result: Numbers 1, 2, and 3 are highlighted and added to the selection.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has the VinciCasa app installed and is on the combination selection screen.
test_cases.Expected Result: The total combinations selected is updated to 3.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests selection of multiple numbers but does not cover validation of maximum combinations.

test_cases.Title: Combination Limit_003_VinciCasa_APP_TEST_Mobile_checking combination limit

Steps.Expected Result: The home screen of the VinciCasa app is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select numbers from 1 to 5 on the combination selection screen.
Steps.Expected Result: Numbers 1 to 5 are highlighted and added to the selection.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to select a sixth number (e.g., number 6).
Steps.Expected Result: The app prevents the selection and shows a message indicating the limit is reached.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has the VinciCasa app installed and is on the combination selection screen.
test_cases.Expected Result: Error message displayed stating maximum combinations reached.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests the enforcement of the combination limit but not its configuration.

test_cases.Title: Save Favorites_004_VinciCasa_APP_TEST_Mobile_saving favorites

Steps.Expected Result: The home screen of the VinciCasa app is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select a few numbers for the combination.
Tap on the 'Salva nei preferiti' (Save in Favorites) button.
Steps.Expected Result: The app confirms that the current selections have been saved as favorites.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has the VinciCasa app installed and has made selections.
test_cases.Expected Result: The current selections are successfully saved in the favorites.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers saving functionality but does not validate the state of saved favorites.
